ygData.subject: Re: ROBES
ygData.msgSnippet: You ll find the red robe in the Tower of the Crimson Hands inside the Erudin Palace. Larimus La shain ... someone give a breakdown of what color robes can be
ygData.messageBody:
You'll find the red robe in the Tower of the Crimson Hands inside the
Erudin Palace.

Larimus La'shain


>From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>To: "EQ WIZARDS" <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eq_wizards] ROBES
>Date: Wed, 21 Apr 1999 10:01:20 -0400
>
>I know people already talked about the clothing thing, but can
someone give a breakdown of what color robes can be found where??
>
>SO far all I know is:
>
>Felwithe (high elf city in Greater F.) GREEN ROBE (Sr. Apprentice
Robe too)
>Gnome city in Steamfont??? YELLOW ROBE (Sr. version?)
>
>I was specifically looking for a RED ROBE or BLACK ROBE . . .
>
>Thanks!!!
>
>-Mata 9th lvl High Elf Wizard (Eci)
